tool_description: Quotes-Pro is an Entertainment API that provides random quotes from a vast collection across various categories. It distinguishes itself from the pquotes API by offering a higher quality and quantity of quotes, making it a premier choice for quote retrieval.

api_list.name: quotes
api_list.description: This is the sole endpoint of the Quotes-Pro API. It allows users to send a POST request with a topic parameter to retrieve a random quote related to that topic.
